+      void searchName(String? query) {
+        List<Data> suggestions = <Data>[];
+        if (query!.isEmpty) {
+          suggestions = model.randomCompanies!.data;
+          return;
+        } else {
+          suggestions = model.randomCompanies!.data
+              .where((user) =>
+                  user.name.toLowerCase().contains(query.toLowerCase()))
+              .toList();
+        }
+        setState(() {
+          model.randomCompanies!.data = suggestions;
+        });
